data.title: 6. The Big Finish Magazine: Issue 06
data.meta_description: Award-winning, full-cast original audio dramas from the worlds of Doctor Who, Torchwood, Blake's 7, Class, Dark Shadows, The Avengers, Survivors, The Omega Factor, Star Cops, Sherlock Holmes, Dorian Gray, Pathfinder Legends, The Prisoner, Adam Adamant Lives, Space 1999, Timeslip, Terrahawks, Space Precinct, Thunderbirds, Stingray, Robin Hood, Dark Season, UFO, Stargate
data.text:
From the Big Finish Archives!

We blow the dust off Big Finish Magazine Issue 6, which was originally published on CD in August 2005 and features interviews, behind-the-scenes insights, and previews of forthcoming audio productions.

The cast, writer & director of Doctor Who: Terror Firma discuss the story.

David Tennant interviewed by Mark Wright about his work in Big Finish audio stories.

Producers Nigel Fairs and Jason Haigh-Ellery discuss the fourth season of the Tomorrow People audio stories

Writers Jonathan Clements, Simon Guerrier and Joseph Lidster, with sound designer David Darlington and producer Ian Farrington discuss the UNIT audio stories, plus deleted scenes from UNIT: The Longest Night

An exclusive deleted scene from Doctor Who: The Last introduced by producer/director Gary Russell.

David Warner and Susannah Harker discuss the Sapphire & Steel audio stories.

Plus: trailers and excerpts from various Big Finish releases.

PLEASE NOTE: due to the timey-wimey nature of the Universe, some of the releases mentioned are no longer available to purchase.
